body:
Dear players of Avicus,

I made this post to inform to the community that I will no longer be playing on Avicus. I also made this post because the past few weeks my life has been stressful, and as a result I haven't been in the best mood. I'm trying to resolve some of the more personal issues. Which is part of the reason I've been a complete jerk to some good people. I hope they accept this apology and I wish them luck in their future endeavors. I wish the best for all of you.  

Sincerely,

Case (Ques, Queso, Quesa, Q,  _quesadillas_)
body_tagged:
Dear players of Avicus,

I made this post to inform to the community that I will no longer be playing on Avicus. I also made this post because the past few weeks my life has been stressful, and as a result I haven't been in the best mood. I'm trying to resolve some of the more personal issues. Which is part of the reason I've been a complete jerk to some good people. I hope they accept this apology and I wish them luck in their future endeavors. I wish the best for all of you.  

Sincerely,

Case (Ques, Queso, Quesa, Q,  _quesadillas_)
title: My Goodbye / Apology.
